resources.string: Product name and Price fields can not be empty.
Are you sure you want to delete the file?
Invalid QR code for this app
Are you sure you want to delete the record?
The record could not be deleted
Scan your generated QR codes to display info here!
Create your QR codes to display info here!
"Thank you very much for choosing Daily QR. These are the sections you can find in your app:\n\n"

Here you can create QR codes for your products that you want to inventory sales. When you create your QR code you can save it to your images or share it with another application. Then you can print them or make stickers with them to stick on your products.\n\n

Here you can scan your printed QR codes when making a sale. This will generate a record with the date and time of the sale. You can indicate the quantity of products you are selling, as well as change the sale price in case of a surcharge or discount and the type of payment (Cash, Debit or Credit).\n\n

"Here you can view the daily sales of your products by clicking on the record you want to view. If you hold down the record, you can export it to an excel file that will be saved in your download directory. You can delete a daily record by sliding it and confirming the deletion "

"All the QR codes of the products you have created are registered here. You can download or share them again by clicking on the product name. To delete a record, long press on it and confirm its deletion "
